title: DDOS/Threatening and generally terrible attitude
body:
I was in game against this guy whom was playing Lux on the other team. I have all chat turned off so I minimise my own susceptibility to engage in a&rguments aka be a toxic guy. We happened to win the game meaning the lux, lost, whom my friends were telling me was quite tilted over the whole ordeal. This resulted in a friend request from the lux, where he proceeded to tell me "enjoy ur ddos...and ur 2 bnum buddies" and "your life is shit, queing with 2 bum buddies in silver". Finally he said "check out aussyelo(where he supposedly makes "200k a year" :) and run for the hills because im coming for you". Just putting this out there because people like this is what ruins the game. 
Thanks.

replies.body:
Hi AvCorsair Goku,

**The Boards are not the right place to report things like this**
Also, can you please remove the name as [there is a strict no name and shame policy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules). 

For cases like this, please send in a support ticket to Riot, detailing what happened as well as any evidence you may have (screenshots). Please keep in mind that player support is busy and it may take a lil while for them to get back to you (almost always reply within a week). During this time do not lodge multiple tickets or continue adding information to your existing ticket, as it may send your enquiry to the back of the queue.

Due to privacy reasons Riot can't respond to your ticket with details about if a punishment was handed out or not.

> [In the future,  definitely utilise the end of game reporting feature. Consistent reports are the only way to ensure that a player gets punished.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player)

Could you please link me, I tried to follow the steps but i got redirected to this page and so I did it here. Also as I said in my initial post, I was not harrassed until after the game, when he added me.
Thanks

Yup, [here you go](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). 

File it under "I have a question about league of legends/Riot games">> "General question"
